r.d:
PhpSlim is the PHP port of Robert C. Martin's Slim (Simple List Invocation Method).
It is written and maintained by Gregor Gramlich.
You need a copy of FitNesse to run the FitNesse wiki. Download the latest release (use the zip file) from http://fitnesse.org/FitNesseDevelopment.DownLoad
r.n: First release of PhpSlim as PEAR package.
